original_text: And he hanged the king of Ai on a tree until evening. And at sunset Joshua commanded, and they took his body down from the tree and threw it at the entrance of the gate of the city and raised over it a great heap of stones, which stands there to this day.
korean_text: 그가 또 아이 왕을 저녁 때까지 나무에 달았다가 해 질 때에 명령하여 그의 시체를 나무에서 내려 그 성문 어귀에 던지고 그 위에 돌로 큰 무더기를 쌓았더니 그것이 오늘까지 있더라

sentences.original_text: And he hanged the king of Ai on a tree

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 해 질 때에 여호수아가 명령하니

sentences.original_text: and they took his body down from the tree
and threw it at the entrance of the gate of the city
and raised over it a great heap of stones,
which stands there to this day.
